title: Smart Data Models - PFVArType2IEEEVArController
description: Adapted from CIM data models. The class represents IEEE VAR Controller Type 2 which is a summing point type controller. It makes up the outside loop of a two-loop system. This controller is implemented as a slow PI type controller, and the voltage regulator forms the inner loop and is implemented as a fast controller.  Reference: IEEE Standard 421.5-2005 Section 11.5.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be PFVArType2IEEEVArController

exlon.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Overexcitation or under excitation flag () true = 1 (not in the overexcitation or underexcitation state, integral action is active) false = 0 (in the overexcitation or underexcitation state, so integral action is disabled to allow the limiter to play its role). Default: False

ki.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Integral gain of the pf controller (). Default: 0.0

kp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Proportional gain of the pf controller (). Default: 0.0

qref.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Reactive power reference (). Default: 0.0

vclmt.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum output of the pf controller (). Default: 0.0

vref.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator reference (). Default: 0.0

vs.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Generator sensing voltage (). Default: 0.0
